page.title: 11Tourism - Beauty Spots
page.content: Hollingworth Lake approx. three miles from Rochdale's town centre, is surrounded by a nature reserve and a park. There are plenty of amenities for the public. These include a children's playground; shops and cafes as well as an amusement arcade; boats can be hired and daily fishing licences may be bought. For the keen naturalist, there is a nature trail and a bird sanctuary. Tandle Hills is a beautiful country park, approx. four miles from the town centre. Ideal as a picnic area in summer; popular for sledging in winter. It has lovely nature walks with spectacular views of nearby farms and local moorland. For the sportsman there is orienteering and for the family, there is Pet's Corner and pitch-and-putt facilities.
